title: Ranger
content:
th, Dexterity Skills: Choose any 3 Skills from Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, Survival

STARTING EQUIPMENT

Leather Armour, Leather Boots Shortbow, Arrow of Ice Health Potion x2, Scroll of Revivify

RANGER SPELLCASTING

Half Spellcasters: Gains spellcasting at level 2. Unlocks new spell level every 4 Ranger levels starting at level 2, up to level 3 spells. Cantrips: From selected Favoured Enemy only. Spell Save DC: 8 + your Proficiency bonus + yo
